WorkItem.Description: When trying to add drain soul into a rotation, it won't actually ever get cast assuming there's something else needing to be cast more often than once every 15 seconds. One example of this is a rotation of Haunt + Corruption + Drain Soul. Drain soul does not get cast. This leads to the incorrect result of hast being completely irrelevant. It looks as though there have been multiple attempts to get Drain Soul implemented that have been baked out for one reason or another in the code.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Cannot add Drain Soul to a rotation

Comments.Message: The addition of Drain Soul to the rotation for Warlocks is a necessary for affliction warlocks.  I've seen my DPS shoot through the roof on a long boss fight when I can let it tick as my filler when the boss is below 25%.  The only problem is that right now there seems to be one filler possibility and that's all.
I agree, during our execute phase, Drain Soul is technically our main filler spell after refreshing our dots that are about to drop off. This can produce up to 1/3 of our damage on boss fights.
